import React, { useState } from 'react' const RegisterPage = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', password: '', confirmPassword: '', }) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }) } const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() setLoading(true) try { // Mock registration - replace with actual API call console.log('Registration data:', formData) // Redirect will be handled by App.js } catch (error) { console.error('Registration failed:', error) } finally { setLoading(false) } } return (
